issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
If an instance is recreated after the original instance create event has been exported and deleted then an error will occur when next exporting and importing to the data warehouse:

{code}
# eucadw-import-data -e /tmp/export.xml -E
Database password: 
2012-10-22 16:35:57 ERROR | Batch entry 0 insert into reporting_instance_create_events (creation_timestamp, timestamp_ms, availability_zone, instance_id, instance_type, user_id, uuid, id) values ('2012-10-22 15:28:04.736000 -07:00:00', '1350944884734', 'PARTI00', 'i-627A4396', 'm1.small', 'XT7RLQVPQXT5LAACAXM3G', 'd8e86942-47ab-4c2-9b24-9280f29dd1f8', '4128b3273a8a884e013a8a9708000124') was aborted.  Call getNextException to see the cause.
0 [main] ERROR org.hibernate.util.JDBCExceptionReporter  - Batch entry 0 insert into reporting_instance_create_events (creation_timestamp, timestamp_ms, availability_zone, instance_id, instance_type, user_id, uuid, id) values ('2012-10-22 15:28:04.736000 -07:00:00', '1350944884734', 'PARTI00', 'i-627A4396', 'm1.small', 'XT7RLQVPQXT5LAACAXM3G', 'd8e86942-47ab-4c2-9b24-9280f29dd1f8', '4128b3273a8a884e013a8a9708000124') was aborted.  Call getNextException to see the cause.
2012-10-22 16:35:57 ERROR | ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "reporting_instance_create_events_uuid_key"
                          |   Detail: Key (uuid)=(d8e86942-47ab-4c2-9b24-9280f29dd1f8) already exists.
2 [main] ERROR org.hibernate.util.JDBCExceptionReporter  - ERROR: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "reporting_instance_create_events_uuid_key"
  Detail: Key (uuid)=(d8e86942-47ab-4c2-9b24-9280f29dd1f8) already exists.

Call getNextException to see the cause.
	at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement$BatchResultHandler.handleError(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:2621)
	at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.processResults(QueryExecutorImpl.java:1837)
	at org.postgresql.core.v3.QueryExecutorImpl.execute(QueryExecutorImpl.java:407)
	at org.postgresql.jdbc2.AbstractJdbc2Statement.executeBatch(AbstractJdbc2Statement.java:2754)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:616)
	at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.invoke(ProxyStatement.java:100)
	at org.logicalcobwebs.proxool.ProxyStatement.intercept(ProxyStatement.java:57)
	at org.postgresql.core.BaseStatement$$EnhancerByProxool$$4c42528e.executeBatch(<generated>)
	at org.hibernate.jdbc.BatchingBatcher.doExecuteBatch(BatchingBatcher.java:70)
	at org.hibernate.jdbc.AbstractBatcher.executeBatch(AbstractBatcher.java:268)
	... 17 more
{code}

The error prevents any data being imported to the data warehouse.

This issue is due to a new create event being present in the cloud database which has the same instance uuid but a different event id.

It is possible that this issue also occurs with EBS instances that are restarted after the origin creation event has been exported and deleted.
fields.summary: Data warehouse import can fail after data deleted from cloud

comments.body:
Still reproducible using eucadw:
Version     : 3.2.0
Release     : 0.0.80.20121107gitdd0cb22e.el6


{code}
root@eucahost-51-172 ~]# eucadw-import-data -e exportdata2.txt -E -p mypassword
